text: A Treatise of Human Nature: Being an Attempt to Introduce the Experimental Method of Reasoning into Moral Subjects (1739â€“40) is a book by Scottish philosopher David Hume, many consider it one of his most important books or one of the most important books in all of philosophy.The book has appeared in many editions after the death of the author.
